Package utils

Class Chooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Chooser
  • public class Chooser
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for random selection from lists based on probabilities.

    Provides static methods for randomly choosing from a set of options, either with uniform probability or weighted by density values.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    [Project Team]

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Chooser()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.Object choose​(java.util.List<?> options, java.util.List<? extends java.lang.Number> density)
      Randomly selects an option from a list based on weighted probabilities (density).
      static java.lang.Object chooseOne​(java.util.List<?> options)
      Randomly selects one option from a list with uniform probability.
      static boolean coinFlip()
      Randomly returns true or false with equal probability (50/50).
      static boolean randomTrue​(java.lang.Double test)
      Returns true with probability test, false with probability 1.0 - test.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chooser

        public Chooser()

    • Method Detail

      • choose

        public static java.lang.Object choose​(java.util.List<?> options,
                                      java.util.List<? extends java.lang.Number> density)
        Randomly selects an option from a list based on weighted probabilities (density).

        The density list should contain probability values that sum to 1.0. Each density value corresponds to the probability of selecting the option at that index in the options list.

        Parameters:
        options - the list of options to choose from
        density - the probability density for each option
        Returns:
        the randomly selected option

      • chooseOne

        public static java.lang.Object chooseOne​(java.util.List<?> options)
        Randomly selects one option from a list with uniform probability.
        Parameters:
        options - the list of options to choose from
        Returns:
        a randomly selected option

      • coinFlip

        public static boolean coinFlip()
        Randomly returns true or false with equal probability (50/50).
        Returns:
        a random boolean value

      • randomTrue

        public static boolean randomTrue​(java.lang.Double test)
        Returns true with probability test, false with probability 1.0 - test.
        Parameters:
        test - the probability of returning true (must be in range [0, 1])
        Returns:
        true with probability test, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if test is outside the range [0, 1]
